poem.title: Note for the Record
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Hide and seek
Hidden and sought
Bubble and squeak
Diddly squat

Don't speak
Until they spot
The smiling sleek-
it onslaught

Of that knicker-twisted, sneaky
Little snot-
Stiffened streak
Of drool, distraught

From loathing
To a colder purpose.
